condition.ab: Dark brown papyrus consisting of two fragments, only one of which is depicted on the photo. Written with a thin pen in black ink which has disappeared in many places, perpendicular to the fibers on Recto, parallel to the fibers on Verso. The original cutting lines have partially been preserved at the bottom and right sides. The top and left sides are broken off. The upper right corner of the second fragment is lost without any loss of letters. Some fibers have disappeared causing a loss of one to two letters in several lines. There are many smaller holes leading to a considerable loss of text.
